name: Go Ninja Go
description:
First prototypical project for me on the Unreal engine, this game is based around the sidescroller theme.

For as long as I can remember, games like Sonic would encourage going fast up until the second zone where you would have to slow down. 

This game builds on that spirit and adds several new things:

- you can attack or dodge instead of just jumping

- you have a double jump

- there is no speed cap as long as you run on the ground

- you have a health bar

- you can recover from damage by being bounced and having air control

Additionally, each level has its own theme.

I wanted to make some boss fights but decided against it. Maybe in another version of the game later on.
